subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A baseball academy that opened in Oaxaca in 2009 has trainers, dormitories and seven fields, but it has no players from the state of Oaxaca.
snippet: A baseball academy that opened in Oaxaca in 2009 has trainers, dormitories and seven fields, but it has no players from the state of Oaxaca.
